entities.name: dream
entities.description: Harry mentioned that he had a dream and was trying to meet Hermione's glower with a look of innocence.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who noticed Harry's scar and suspected that he was looking into Voldemort's mind.

entities.name: vol -- / you-know-who
entities.description: Voldemort's name is mentioned as 'You-Know-Who' to avoid saying it out loud.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who warned Harry not to say Voldemort's name.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who had a dream and was trying to meet Hermione's glower with a look of innocence.

entities.name: occlumency
entities.description: Hermione suggested that Harry could learn to control his dreams by applying Occlumency.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione had a conversation about Harry's dream.
Ron warned Harry not to say Voldemort's name.
